page_summary: This page presents annotations for a clinical report form (CRF) used in breast cancer studies to identify and document target lesions, including tumor identification, location, laterality, directionality, methods of evaluation, date of evaluation, evaluator details, and measurements such as tumor diameter, in accordance with RECIST 1.1 criteria. It highlights the SDTM and CDASH variable mapping and provides options for specific choices and attributes relevant to target lesion documentation.
